formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Active Pressure: \( P_a = \frac{1}{2} \cdot \gamma \cdot H^2 \cdot K_a \) Passive Pressure: \( P_p = \frac{1}{2} \cdot \gamma \cdot H^2 \cdot K_p \)
